sentence.Network_en: She was an intelligent woman who refused to be a rich man's plaything.
sentence.Network_cn: 她是个有头脑的女性，拒不肯做富人的玩物。

sentence.Network_en: He would not allow anyone to make him into a political plaything for their own ends.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不会允许任何人为了达到其自身目的把他变成政治玩物。

sentence.Network_en: You thought you'd make a toy of me -- a plaything.
sentence.Network_cn: 你只想到把我当作你的玩物 -- 一个玩具.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 独一有点近于玩物(Plaything)的喜好即是心爱下围棋。当时(Then)我如故很自傲的，凭着我对他的推斥力，要交喜欢“修理”你的朋友—…
玩具类的英语单词有哪些?_百度知道 ... knickknack 小玩意儿 plaything 玩具 game 游戏.
Character  - Chinese Character... ... 耍玩[ play] 文玩[ plaything;articles for amusement] 雅玩[ elegant plaything].
玩弄-的英语翻译-bab.la词典 ... (女子)玩弄男人 coquetry 被玩弄的人 plaything 玩弄女性 philander.

list.abs: The warlord treated his concubines as graceful playthings ., 那个军阀把他的小妾当作美丽的玩物.
They are not a political plaything ., 这不是一场政治游戏.
[elegant plaything] 高雅的玩赏物这花玲珑可爱,堪作案头雅玩雅相 yǎxiàng [dignity;honourable] 好看;体面(多用于否定) 别动手动脚的,让人撞见多不雅相.
I used to get them new playthings to keep them quiet ., 我过去总是给他们买新玩具来使他们安静.

entry.def: A plaything is a toy or other object that a child plays with.

example.ex: ...an untidy garden scattered with children's playthings.
example.tran: 到处散落着玩具的凌乱的花园

entry.def: If you say that someone is treating you as a plaything, you think that they are using you for their amusement or advantage, and do not care about you.

example.ex: ...an unfaithful husband who treated women as playthings...
example.tran: 把女人当玩物的不忠丈夫

example.ex: He would not allow anyone to make him into a political plaything for their own ends.
example.tran: 他不会允许任何人为了达到其自身目的把他变成政治玩物。

means.word_mean: 1. an artifact designed to be played with

auth_sentence.content: She was the helpless plaything of great mechanical forces.
auth_sentence.res_content: She was the helpless plaything of great mechanical forces.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She was the helpless plaything of great mechanical forces.

auth_sentence.content: The little girl...a curly-headed, rosy-cheeked poppet,...the pet and plaything of a large family.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The little girl...a curly-headed, rosy-cheeked poppet,...the pet and plaything of a large family.

auth_sentence.content: Opponents have warned that the railway risked becoming "a plaything of the rich".
auth_sentence.res_content: Opponents have warned that the railway risked becoming "a plaything of the rich".
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Opponents have warned that the railway risked becoming "a plaything of the rich".
